![](2024-images/ugrs.webp){width="100%" fig-align="center"}

Four PADLAB undergraduates presented at the 2024 [UCR Undergraduate Research and Creative Activities Symposium](https://engage.ucr.edu/symposium), showcasing their work in the lab over the academic year.

Jocelyn Lam presented "Exploring predictors of infants' daily object holding".

![](2024-images/Jocelyn_UCR_2024.jpeg){width="100%" fig-align="center"}

Kaylee Cheung presented "Does infant body position vary depending on the presence of siblings?".

![](2024-images/Kaylee_URS_2024.jpeg){width="100%" fig-align="center"}
Ilayna Garcia presented "Exploring video ecological momentary assessment for early detection of infant motor development".

![](2024-images/Ilayna_URS_2024.jpeg){width="100%" fig-align="center"}

Rashmi Chandrasekar presented "Effective sequences in infant position transitions".

![](2024-images/Rashmi_URS_2024.jpeg){width="100%" fig-align="center"}
